p: This document describes how to upgrade a server from release 2.0.0 to release 2.1.0.b1 of Hedgehog where 2.1 is installed from a tarball of the source code.

ac:rich-text-body.p: 2.0.0rc2 and 2.0.0 do not differ and therefore this guide can also be used to upgrade from 2.0.0rc2 to 2.1.0b2

p.span: Installation from packages is supported from 2.1 onwards. Support for installation directly from source is likely to be discontinued in a future version. It is recommended that users migrate to installing from packages from 2.1 where possible (see the Upgrade Guide).
If desired, back up the existing installation (the directory structure in the User Guide is a useful reference) and database.

ac:structured-macro.ac:plain-text-body: # common dependencies sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ondrej/pkg-nlnetlabs sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install postgresql-9.3-ip4r postgresql-plpython-9.3 libgetdns1 \ python-getdns help2man # data manager dependencies sudo apt-get install python-ipy python-dev python-yaml python-dnspython \ python-psycopg2 # web front-end dependencies sudo apt-get install libjs-jquery libjs-jquery-ui unifont r-cran-rjson

h3: 1.2 Download, configure and make new release
p: (If you downloaded the above URL with wget the tarball will be called 2.1.0b2.tar.gz)

ac:structured-macro.ac:plain-text-body: tar -xzf hedgehog-2.1.0b2.tar.gz cd hedgehog-2.1.0.b1 ./autogen.sh mkdir build cd build ../configure [--prefix=] [--disable-web] [--disable-data-manager] make

p: Stop refile and grok cron job running:

ac:structured-macro.ac:plain-text-body: sudo -u hedgegho crontab -e # Import XML data every 15 mins 00,15,30,45 * * * * <prefix>/bin/refile_and_grok.sh -c >> /var/log/hedgehog/refile_and_grok_xml_to_db.sh.log 2>&1

p: Comment out any other jobs that are about to run. If the dsc-extractor process is running wait for it to finish before continuing.
It is recommended to disable the web front end during upgrade e.g by enabling a holding page.

p.span: Run as super user of hedgehog database (e.g. postgres)

ac:structured-macro.ac:plain-text-body: psql hedgehog -c "CREATE EXTENSION ip4r SCHEMA dsc;" psql hedgehog -c "CREATE EXTENSION plpythonu SCHEMA pg_catalog;"

p: Re-enable and test the web front end. Make sure to restart apache.
Note that 2 new optional cron jobs are suggested for 2.1 for updating the TLD and geoIP databases. Refer to the Installation Guide for a full list of suggested cron jobs.

ac:rich-text-body.p: Remember to use the new script names and syntax when re-enabling the cron jobs

p: Restart refile and grok cron job running:

ac:structured-macro.ac:plain-text-body: sudo -u hedgehog crontab -e # Import XML data every 15 mins 00,15,30,45 * * * * <prefix>/bin/refile_and_grok -c >> /var/log/hedgehog/refile_and_grok_xml_to_db.log 2>&1

p: Re-enable any other jobs that were disabled for the upgrade.
Refer to section 8.3 of the Installation from Source Guide for how to configure the rssacd demon to collect RSSAC zone-size and load-time statistics.
